targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  account_credit
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  hostname,
  machine_id
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,10m),
  sum(earn_hour * 0.75) / count(earn_hour * 0.75) * count(DISTINCT machine_id) AS "overall earn_hour"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,10m)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  hostname AS metric,
  earn_hour * 0.75
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  sum(power_consumption) / count(power_consumption) * COUNT(DISTINCT(machine_id+'/'+hw_id)) AS "power_consumption"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,$__interval)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  reliability AS value,
  CONCAT(machine_id, '') AS metric
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  reliability AS value,
  hostname AS metric
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id,
  earn_hour * 0.75 AS "earn_houry",
  earn_day * 0.75 AS "earn_day"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id,
  power_consumption
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 0
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id,
  power_consumption
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'gpu' AND
  hw_id = 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",

  reliability,
  rentals_on_demand,

ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id,
  utilisation,
  temperature
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'cpu'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'ram'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'disk_space'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  machine_id,
  utilisation - min(utilisation) OVER ( PARTITION BY machine_id ORDER BY time) as DataUsed
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'network'
ORDER BY time
